attributes.action: Mandatory carbohydrate information on all menus for those with type 1/2 diabetes
attributes.additional_details: Carb info will enable better glucose control, save lives and take pressure off NHS. Information is available for vegetarians, vegans (lifestyle choices) and gluten/nut etc allergy so diabetics should have the same information for equality and inclusion.  Diabetics shouldn’t have to gamble with their health/lives due to lack of nutritional carbohydrate information. Lack of carb info can lead to wrong amount of insulin being administered which can be fatal.
attributes.background: Make carbohydrate information mandatory on ALL foods and food establishments including restaurants, takeaways etc to assist those with type 1/2 diabetes. Food allergy info is mandatory to prevent fatalities and so should carb information to enable diabetics to administer correct insulin amount.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Diana Johnson MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Kingston upon Hull North
